website_summaries.verdict: Canon's high-performing EOS Rebel SL1 is the tiniest digital SLR you can put your hands on, but it may be too small for some hands.
cons: May be too small for some hands

customer_reviews.title: So impressed
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a photography course and my tutor recommended this camera. I wanted a brand new one but couldn’t fine one so I opted for this second hand camera. I can highly recommend this company - the camera came with everything - all of the instructions and cables, it was tested before shipping and even has a wrrenty. They clean it up to look like new and it works perfectly. I Love it. A quick and hassle free purchase. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Foster

customer_reviews.title: I am a poor photographer who wanted to improve my ability and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to the person who used this camera at Crufts. I bought it because you said it was not too heavy and you were right. I am a poor photographer who wanted to improve my ability and this helps enormously. Simple to use and very responsive. Even the setting "without flash" produced good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TH Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this beyond bounds for beginner photographers or people who want a durable camera to throw around. I have used it for 2 years now and have taken it around the world on various holiday trips, shot in the rain, dropped it from a roof and accidentally spray painted it yet it has remained intact and the only things i've had to replace are lenses. Auto focus is quick, easily navigable settings and the pop up flash make it great for street shots.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality :) and a brilliant SLR camera
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality :) and hasn't disappointed. I did my research before making this purchase and it came highly recommended. It is an incredible camera, compact, light weight and loaded with features and easy to use. Very happy and want to recommend this (EOS 100D) to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic general purpose cam for your average user interested in photography.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this little camera. I'm really interested in photography and this has been a perfect introduction and fulfils all my personal and professional needs. I work in animation and design so I do not make money from my photographs but is has been incredibly useful for taking reference photos and video without breaking the bank. It's small, light-weight and not so expensive that you are constantly worrying about it when out and about or travelling abroad. I did not want a camera that would break my neck every time I carried it around for a day, this is perfectly sized so that I don't think twice about taking it with me, ideal for travel.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyG

customer_reviews.title: Great grab and go camera
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Matched to the Canon pancake lenses it's very small and manageable. AF's a bit hit or miss, but not bad. I prefer the manual mode and the touchscreen is nice if erratic. Build quality is very good. Super, tough budget camera!
customer_reviews.author: Justice Peace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, lightweight camera.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and really easy to use. On a recent trip I took almost 2000 pics and am very pleased. It's particularly good in low light. One thing - it didn't come with even a basic memory card. Which I thought was pretty cheap of Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera it is a nice backup lovely and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera it is a nice backup lovely and light sling it over my shoulder do not even notice the weight there when I need it, bit clunky when shooting but a fine little bit of kit. Size is to my liking and can cope with my big hands despite being very small for a dslr would recommend this camera back up or main it can take it. One criticism is battery and card share slot do not like that set up but guess if you are trying to make the camera as small as possible you have to make some sacrifices.
customer_reviews.author: gary bremner

customer_reviews.title: The camera body arrived in excellent time & very securely packaged
customer_reviews.text: The camera body arrived in excellent time & very securely packaged. The only problem was that it did not come with an English handbook! However I downloaded the official Canon instructions - all nearly 400 pages! Nevertheless a very competitive price & very satisfied. I have several Canon cameras & this one is just superb!
customer_reviews.author: L E D Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Semi idiot proof but you will need to practice. As per most men I haven't bothered to read the downloadable instructions as I'm 52 now and don't anticipate the life expectancy required to read it all.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. M. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great for stills photography, poor for video
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for still photography - great in low level lighting. But don't buy this to shoot video. The autofocus is poor - if you pan there is a real delay while the camera tries to focus on what you're shooting. Even if you're shooting something static the camera will struggle and pull in and out of focus. I have had this three months and now need to upgrade to something that can shoot great videos as well as take great quality stills.
customer_reviews.author: two fish

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic camera with great spec
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic camera with great spec. Small and lightweight great for people with difficulties with hands and fingers like me. EF-S 18-55 mm produces great images especially close-ups. You can get really close with it. Even shooting in auto modes great images. Change to creative modes you are in charge and up to you how creative you want to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good camera and excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Small, light-weight and well specified. Ideal for travel. The touch-screen is a nice enhancement. Other reviewers have complained that the picture quality is no better than the likes of the 12mP 1200d but that is more likely down to the lens. I've teamed mine with a better quality lens that I had spare so should get very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M

customer_reviews.title: No lightweight
customer_reviews.text: When you have lugged around a Canon 50D with a big lens, spare batteries etc it's nice to scale things down without losing the advantage of shooting with a DSLR. Tried compacts and four third cameras and found them lacking. The 100D has all the bells and whistles without the bulk or weight and will travel with me most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to have such a camera.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a top notch, I just need time to learn how to use it. This was a second hand bargain of the year. almost perfect condition. Lucky me!!
customer_reviews.author: Grant Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Canon 100D DSLR with EFS 18-55mm lens
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful camera,much lighter than the others.Nice touch screen which I have never had before.The pictures are brilliant.Very clear. Some people may call this an entry model but It is far better than my previous camera.Also a Canon.Cannot beat canon for a quality product..The price is very reasonable too on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Verity

customer_reviews.title: this is good, small body but internally equal to 7D
customer_reviews.text: this is good, small body but internally equal to 7D, I bought this for my 2nd camera , 1 high quality screen, 2 sharp image 3 small body but good handling 4 battery seems good 5 wonderful Video focus system 6 high ISO
customer_reviews.author: WLU

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: What a camera. Pictures are as good as DSLR of larger size, noise reduction is superb and it is the best entry-level camera I have used. So versatile and perfect for any occasion. You lose nothing with the small size, and, if anything, you gain more from your money. Cannot rate any more highly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Small and versatile
customer_reviews.text: My favourite backup camera - very small and good enough focus. Can use my full frame lenses without any problem
customer_reviews.author: Henrik V

customer_reviews.title: Love it: -)
customer_reviews.text: Love it :-).....this is my first DSLR and am loving the experimentation on it....as a wee note to people who might be interested in getting their first DSLR, consider getting only the body, and then separately get a zoom lens, as that is the only way you could really zoom in
customer_reviews.author: Clo

customer_reviews.title: Canon know what they are doing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful piece of kit, I know you can get smaller devices with perhaps better specs but it is nice to hold a camera and for it to feel like a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dmd1661

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a first DSLR
customer_reviews.text: This is my first DSLR and so I was really excited to see that it's a lot better than I expected! I'm still learning to use all the automatic functions and slowly learning manual mode, but the quality of the images is great and it really is challenging. The size and weight of the camera is perfect for someone with small hands too. The IS lens also helps a lot to prevent shaky photos; I'm happy I decided to get this lens even though I never tried any other one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Everything we had hoped for and the lens included in ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything we had hoped for and the lens included in this kit is very versatile and absolutely silent (which wasn't the case for the standard kit lens that I tested in a store). Only just scraped the surface of what this camera can do, lots and lots to learn !
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED as a first camera. If you intend to get serious later - then opt for something like the 750.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera - a step above the 1000 in every way. Got it for my 12 year old daughter and she loves it. Canon menus are so simple to use (sorry Nikon) and the video quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Bania

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the camera. Even being a newbie in photography, I could take lots of photos using different techniques and the quality is amazing. The canon softwares are good as well; I always receive some tutorials and tips from canon to use the camera with more quality and learn more about photography. It worth a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter camera, and after a recent photography weekend it keeps up with some of the big boy cameras as well. Lens that comes with it is ok to start if with.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pour commencer dans la photo et en blanc il est juste trop beau !! Tres facile a prendre en main et objectif polyvalent.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaud

customer_reviews.title: its a great camera taking really high quality shots no less than ...
customer_reviews.text: its Canon say no more, its a great camera taking really high quality shots no less than you would expect, surprisingly light , if your looking for a compact SLR this is a cracker, looking forward to getting a lot more use in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Fab camera - very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera just over a year ago and have taken 100s if not 1000s of photos. I am delighted with the photos that this camera produces. I am a complete amateur but the images are far better than those produced by my old canon I used previously (purchased in 2006). I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it! Perfect for beginners and quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Melis

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace our eos 350d- massive difference! The spec is the spec, have a look for yourself. The ease of use, the quality of output, the sound it makes are all incredible. And it's really light and innocuous, which you probably don't think is a big deal, but it is, so be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kenchenko

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Good so far, as a relative beginner I find it easy to use, have yet to get to grips with all the features, but with time I am sure I will be OK, quite light to carry, so all in all well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Cracking first SLR camera
customer_reviews.text: What a cracking first SLR, this will be a Christmas gift for my eldest teenage daughter. I'm sure she'll love it, it's got a fabulous range of features and as a beginner level represents a great entry into the Canon range.
customer_reviews.author: Gordi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, it's small but chunky and so well made, feels like better rubber and materials the most expensive models in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: PERKS

customer_reviews.title: Compact cameras BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Superb.cannot be faulted. Espescially with the pancake lenses. 270 flash fits nicely, mind you 430 would not be too much of a handful. Compact cameras BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love quality of this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love quality of this camera! Its small, quite light and easy to use. Feels good in hand. Image quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Curly Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and very fast delivery, I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jesús R.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, high quality, flexible. As it's smaller than some SLRs, this model is great for women or teenagers with smaller hands
customer_reviews.author: imaginarydogowner

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SLR so I'm no expert, but after shopping around and trying out a few of my friends SLRs I selected this one and I'm completely satisfied with it. Small compared to other SLRS which is great, but still has excellent quality photos. Easy to use (for a beginner like me!). Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: rammina

customer_reviews.title: no utility disk :(
customer_reviews.text: camera came very quickly in fact 2 days before promised date all working fine just 1 gripe utilities disk is missing and everything but the utility for downloading to PC is available on canon site so just able to manually copy using windows
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Canon camera EOS 100D
customer_reviews.text: this camera is fantastic its light easy to hold and operate takes great pictures which are very clear the card is easy to take out and insert into your computer I would recomand this camera to anyone who as not used one before.
customer_reviews.author: tractorbert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product price was reduced AFTER I purchased it......(always happens to me)
customer_reviews.author: D R GARNHAM

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase.. proper clarified pictures.. it's been two years almost. I like to pose. Best buy ever
customer_reviews.author: Seetha

customer_reviews.title: Well priced light weight camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light weight camera. Easy to use and great results from stills and video.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Cracking little camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Bought this to replace a Canon D1000 which was stolen on holiday. This is much less bulky to carry around than other models, also had a Canon D500 and this is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for a better camera. Hopefully I can utilise all the functions. Easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: BCD

customer_reviews.title: Enhancing Performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the body of my 400D. Astounded by the improvement in performance. Seems to take pictures in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the 100D
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the 100D . It has brought back the pleasure of DSLR photography after a series of compacts, and does everything I want from a camera, but with lightness and compactness ( and that includes the lens ). GREAT CAMERA !
customer_reviews.author: john broom

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quick and well packed. Light easy to use camera. I have been playing with it for a few months and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iak

customer_reviews.title: a bit disappointed with the battery life
customer_reviews.text: a bit disappointed with the battery life. had to replace with an after market one which performs to the standards and quality of the camera. plus factor is the small size and weight. good features, manual a bit blunt. all good
customer_reviews.author: Tryfonas Gkarnetas

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be an excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an excellent piece of equipment. Lots of features to get to know. Looking forward to familiarising myself with them.
customer_reviews.author: D.M Curwen

customer_reviews.title: the instruction booklet you get with it is very easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: a very reasonable priced camera for what it can do. the instruction booklet you get with it is very easy to understand. if you are just starting out with serious photography this is a good first camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DSLR for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying getting to know the camera. Information and instruction discs supplied with the pack are useful in gaining a better understanding of how to get the most out of your pictures. Setting features in the camera is easy to do. Looks like the next acquisition will be anotehr lens to provide more options.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Adey

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful camera. It is definitely small enough to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful camera. It is definitely small enough to carry along, while taking clean, crisp pictures. I am glad that I invested in this. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yum Mum

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase and even happier with the sellers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and even happier with the sellers. The sellers were excellent as I have reported before.
customer_reviews.author: Norwood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use product. Very nice well balanced photos
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece, I love each and every piece of ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece, I love each and every piece of it, would recommend it to everyone that needs a camera for personal use. the size is portable the shots are 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: muftahu

customer_reviews.title: Bought this cannon camera for christmas present for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cannon camera for christmas present for my daughter. Haven't use it yet, but I can say very very fast delivery and it seems ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Juno Seol

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - needs specific SD card for video
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but note that you'll need a specific SD (class 10) card if you are going to use it for video!
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, buy filters!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera well worth the money! I'd recommend to first timers to get some filters for the lens so it doesn't scratch it. Great entry level DSLR!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant device. Bought for a gift. Build quality is great - feels nice and sturdy, despite being smaller in body that it's older 1200d sibling. Photo quality also great.
customer_reviews.author: suivezgeo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, really good for a starting camera getting into photography!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I ever made, this camera is small and light so I can take it almost everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very light, functional item, perfect for mine as beginner's needs. It does correspond to description: learn and enjoy taking pictures .
customer_reviews.author: Jurgita

customer_reviews.title: easy pics
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, small and light I am really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Buddie

customer_reviews.title: I have one of these already and have just bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these already and have just bought one for my daughter so she doesn't have to keep borrowing it!
customer_reviews.author: emerald

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera- so light
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera- so light, compact and easy to use. Also the display looks so stylish- amazing photo quality!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loving it as a first step into digital slr photography
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and small with power and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I was promised and have been using it constantly ever since! It was a brilliant buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Camilleri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, light, handy and beautiful pictures. What more do you want ???
customer_reviews.author: ceezar5

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous little camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that was smaller and lighter than my 6D, for holiday photography. This camera's brilliant; apart from the fact that it's a cropped sensor it's not really any different from the 6D in what I can do with it, and picture quality. Have to say though that I love the touch screen - it makes changing shutter speed, aperture, ISO, shooting priorities etc really easy. One day all DSLRs will have these features. I believe the 100D has won awards, and rightly so.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marshall

customer_reviews.title: all fine for now
customer_reviews.text: I've just received this camera! Very fast delivery, all fine for now. The size of this model was the selling point for me as I really hate carrying bulky DSLR cameras but I feel I have grown out of the point and shoot cameras I've had up to now. Best of both worlds really. The only snag is that I'm sure it will be front heavy with bulkier lenses, when I succumb to buying them. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Fabri

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera. I did research and it seemed like the best one for me. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... some time for me to decide and I'm not disappointed, it's a great camera and so easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: It took some time for me to decide and I'm not disappointed, it's a great camera and so easy to use which I really wanted with this been my first DSLR. To be honest I bought this one because it had the touch screen however I haven't used it so the older cheaper 1200 may have been just as good going by the reviews!! saying that I've only had it a couple of days so only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Halligan

customer_reviews.title: A lovely camera
customer_reviews.text: A lovely camera - light enough to carry easily (for an SLR) but good quality images. I bought it to replace another I ruined by taking pictures in heavy rain (don't! If any moisture gets in the camera can be irreparable). I've given it four rather than five stars purely because I am now wary of the build compared with heavier cameras. However it was very heavy rain... Anyway I've bought the same model again so that speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Stopped function and won't turn on after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use and already stopped working! :-( I'm very upset as I purchased this for a research trip and now have to scramble to buy a new one before my trip. It wasn't battery or flashcard failure as I verified it on another camera. Can't get it to turn on or respond at all anymore! It was working perfectly fine, images and video are lovely, easy to handle and very lightweight. Battery life is not great at all. Highly recommend purchasing extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: KMV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the price, with great quality shots even relative to my old 600D, but only (very) minor bugbear is the shutter speed not being quite so good as some other cameras. But for day to day use combined with portability I couldn't ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Falconer

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, it is so easy to use as I am a complete novice! The camera is not heavy and there are easy to follow instructions on the small screen on the back of the camera, I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: eleanor jennet jones

customer_reviews.title: QM2
customer_reviews.text: I will be thoroughly testing this camera during our forthcoming cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the camera but could not register it on Canon website for warranty as site said it had already been registered. Software disc missing and manuals disc was for middle eastern countries. Not happy as this was a birthday present for my wife and now applying for a full refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cannon.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, easy to use. Cannot wait to take a few photographs with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Don't use outside
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing camera regarding quality of photo's,ease of use etc. However it is very vulnerable to water ingress. I got caught in a rain shower and the camera got very slightly wet, and I honestly mean VERY SLIGHTLY. It would not turn on after that. I removed battery and placed in airing cupboard for a week to dry out and unfortunately still dead. Basically its now a paper weight unless canon can do anything. A local quote was well over £100 just to inspect, that does not include parts.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: small , compact, excellent features ,
customer_reviews.text: I am using since 2 months * very handy and compact .
customer_reviews.author: Shaharyar talpur

customer_reviews.title: Canon 100D
customer_reviews.text: Intended as a second camera - to replace a compact - I'm really pleased with this little camera. I wouldn't think about having it as my only DSLR but its light weight makes it great to take out with you on the off-chance that there's something to photograph. With a good quality, multi purpose lens, it's a very useful little camera.
customer_reviews.author: brookwoodsue

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and stunning pictures. Nice size, but if you are expecting a much smaller camera you will be disappointed as this is a little smaller only than standard SLRs. Still trying to work out the auto video mode.
customer_reviews.author: Dr G Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it !
customer_reviews.text: I just love that camera ... Great upgrade from the old 300d. I take a lot of pics of my son and all his progress.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It does all I need it to do and is a great update for my ageing 300D, but the best thing is that it is so light, ideal for travelling. I have quite large hands but have no problem holding it. If you are thinking of buying one you can download the manual from the Canon website to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but still trying to get the £40 cashback
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great. I also have a 1000D and this camera is much, much better. It handles well and takes great photos. However I have not been able to get the £40 cashback from Canon. I have filled in the online form a few times but Canon doesn't get it. I phone Canon up and they tell me to fill the form in again. They need to get their act together, it should be simple.
customer_reviews.author: C C STOREY

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a faulty camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a light travel alternative to my full frame 6D. I am shocked at how bad the photos are, in bright light, fast shutter speed and low ISO, shooting in RAW the images are dull, grainy and not sharp. Worse than the 8 year old 400D. I am assuming this is a faulty camera, with a problem with the sensor or autofocus and have returned. Such a shame as it is a light and portable camera. Perfect for travel for those who like a DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: HelenME

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Has a clunk when you take a photo and I don;t think the reds are as good as my old 450D EOS but for the price, this is good value. It is lighter, which suits me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Platt

customer_reviews.title: great semi professional camera
customer_reviews.text: I got the camera few months ago and I'm very satisfied with it.it met exactly my expectations for small and convenient slr camera that allows to make good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera which takes high quality pictures at any light level. Easy to use and really light weight...delighted with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: l.thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Small and light camera. Photos are perfect. Battery is good so far, enough for a busy afternoon of shooting. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Petr Sulc

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for traveling and also very light so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for traveling and also very light so i can carry it on my hand luggage in the plane. It is even lighter than my vivitar fisheye lens. as far as performance does, it is very good but bear in mind that anything higher than ISO 800 will start to look a bit noisy but then again it's not a 5D and you get what you pay for. I have it mounted on a shoulder strap and with the kit lens (18 - 55) sometimes i forget it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing i have bought
customer_reviews.text: The best camera i have ever bought!!! Its perfect for vlogging everyday and also taking the perfect picture. Your also able to connect an external mic which i have mine on top if the camera. I also have the camera on a tri-pod constantly and i havent yet had problems. Lens cap is a bit fiddley but nothing to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: seems a good design, with clear controls
customer_reviews.text: Canon EOS 100D digital slr camera (EF-S 18-55 lens). I've just got his camera, and was surprised to find no memory card in the packet. The list of contents doesn't include a memory card. If it is not included, that should be made clear in the sales description (which it wasn't). The camera is neat and light, seems a good design, with clear controls. It works fine for stills, I've not yet tried the video option. It was highly recommended to me by a professional photographer, to replace my fading Nikon D70. I hope the Canon has lasting power, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: V. Grisogono

customer_reviews.title: Good to carry
customer_reviews.text: just bought the body i have the lenses, used it twice brilliant as good as my 60D camera. great backup
customer_reviews.author: G. Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not fully tested yet but seems to be a great little piece of kit

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is quite small and light weight. I love the picture quality. Highly recommended product in case you need a good quality gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Ciufu Alexandru

product_meta.title: Canon EOS 100D Digital SLR Camera Body Only - (18MP, CMOS Sensor) 3 inch LCD
product_meta.description: EOS 100D A DSLR you'll never want to leave behind The EOS 100D featuring the super compact EF 40mm f/2.8 STM lens Click here for a larger image.
feature_bullets: Create superb 18 megapixel images with a fully-featured, responsive DSLR that's small enough to take everywhere
Easy to use: Scene Intelligent Auto analyses the conditions and picks the optimal camera settings
Compose using an optical viewfinder or a large Clear View LCD II Touch screen
Continuous focusing when shooting Full-HD movies with Hybrid CMOS AF II. Create edited clip sequences in camera using Video Snapshot
Be artistic with Creative filters. Extra Effect Shot captures a filtered and unfiltered shot simultaneously
